titleInfo.title: Men and boy on levee and pirogue

mods.abstract: Camera looking at 8 men and a boy - 3 men on levee, 5 men and a boy stand in pirogue moored to levee - flooded buildings in backgroundSame people as F0402dProbably Caernarvon.
